E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/2/1993
Subject: Progress of Jamie Burke
Dear Sir,
Jamie Burke is hitting the ball well at A Lakeland Tigers!
He has an AVG of .303, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1993
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Mike Boddicker



Date: Saturday, 6/14/1993
Subject: Playing time
Manager,
I am not very happy about my playing time recently.
I think I deserve a starting spot!

Regards,
Vic Rodriguez



Date: Monday, 7/7/1993
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Jeff Lahti



Date: Friday, 9/5/1993
Subject: Eddie Williams healing process
Eddie Williams is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
